English.title: Smart Detection of Lymphedema
English.about_text: This is the Lymphedema Early Detection System. It is designed to detect early signs of lymphedema using machine learning algorithms.

English.diag_low_risk:
For individuals at low risk for lymphedema, it's essential to stay informed about the condition and its early symptoms, such as swelling or skin changes. 

Maintain a healthy weight through balanced diet and regular exercise, keep your skin moisturized and protected from injuries, and avoid heavy lifting or activities that strain your limbs. Use compression garments when recommended and be cautious with extreme temperatures. Regularly monitor for any changes and consult your healthcare provider promptly if symptoms develop.
English.diag_mild:
For individuals with mild lymphedema, it is crucial to manage your condition through regular monitoring and lifestyle adjustments. 

Maintain a healthy weight with a balanced diet and regular exercise, and practice diligent skin care to prevent infections. Use compression garments as recommended by your healthcare provider to support lymphatic function. Avoid activities that excessively strain the affected limb and be cautious with extreme temperatures. Regular follow-ups with your healthcare provider are essential to monitor the condition and ensure timely intervention if symptoms progress.
English.diag_moderate_severe:
For individuals with moderate to severe lymphedema, comprehensive management is crucial. 

Adhere to a regimen that includes consistent use of compression garments, regular lymphatic drainage massages, and physical therapy exercises tailored to improve lymph flow. Maintain rigorous skin care to prevent infections and avoid cuts and burns. Monitor your condition closely and keep regular appointments with your healthcare provider to track progress and adjust treatments as needed. Limit activities that put excessive strain on the affected area and be mindful of temperature extremes. Early and proactive intervention is key to managing symptoms and improving quality of life.
English.This is your first time detecting Lymphe: This is your first time detecting Lymphedema. Keep on excercising and let us see your progress!
This is your first time detecting Lymphedema. Keep on the good record!

Congratulations! Your detection result is better than your last time. Keep on excercising and keep on the good record!

Spanish.diag_low_risk: Para las personas con bajo riesgo de linfedema, es esencial estar informados sobre la condici√≥n y sus s√≠ntomas tempranos, como la hinchaz√≥n o los cambios en la piel. Mant√©n un peso saludable mediante una dieta equilibrada y ejercicio regular, mantiene la piel hidratada y protegida de lesiones, y evita levantar objetos pesados o hacer actividades que tensionen tus extremidades. Usa prendas de compresi√≥n cuando se recomienden y ten cuidado con las temperaturas extremas. Monitorea regularmente cualquier cambio y consulta a tu proveedor de atenci√≥n m√©dica r√°pidamente si desarrollas s√≠ntomas.
Spanish.diag_mild: Para las personas con linfedema leve, es crucial manejar su condici√≥n mediante una monitorizaci√≥n regular y ajustes en el estilo de vida. Mant√©n un peso saludable con una dieta equilibrada y ejercicio regular, y practica un cuidadoso cuidado de la piel para prevenir infecciones. Usa prendas de compresi√≥n seg√∫n lo recomendado por tu proveedor de atenci√≥n m√©dica para apoyar la funci√≥n linf√°tica. Evita actividades que tensen excesivamente la extremidad afectada y ten cuidado con las temperaturas extremas. Las revisiones regulares con tu proveedor de atenci√≥n m√©dica son esenciales para monitorear la condici√≥n y asegurar una intervenci√≥n oportuna si los s√≠ntomas progresan.
Spanish.diag_moderate_severe: Para las personas con linfedema moderado a severo, la gesti√≥n integral es crucial. Adhi√©rete a un r√©gimen que incluya el uso constante de prendas de compresi√≥n, masajes regulares de drenaje linf√°tico y ejercicios de fisioterapia dise√±ados para mejorar el flujo linf√°tico. Mant√©n un cuidado riguroso de la piel para prevenir infecciones y evita cortes y quemaduras. Monitorea tu condici√≥n de cerca y mant√©n citas regulares con tu proveedor de atenci√≥n m√©dica para seguir el progreso y ajustar los tratamientos seg√∫n sea necesario. Limita las actividades que ejerzan una tensi√≥n excesiva en el √°rea afectada y ten cuidado con las temperaturas extremas. La intervenci√≥n temprana y proactiva es clave para manejar los s√≠ntomas y mejorar la calidad de vida.
